backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with user access control, referrals, intakes, beds, facilities, activity logging, and associated data models and state tracking.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report with no listed features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of pre-written summaries describing key frontend components, pages, and hooks.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Production deployment checklist covering prerequisites and backend-first deployment steps.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style definitions using OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the frontend app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/SMOKE_TESTS.md: Manual production smoke test procedures focusing on authentication, admin access, and verifying no Access Pending lockouts.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, admin detection, profile setup, and routing to admin, staff, or partner dashboards.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Access Pending screen shown to non-admin users without assigned roles, with logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/AccessRequestsTa: Displays pending access requests, allowing admins to approve with a principal ID or delete them, with dialogs and loading states.
frontend/src/components/ActivityLogTab.t: Fetches and paginates activity log entries, formatting actions, entities, and timestamps while displaying user names when available.
frontend/src/components/AdminRiskOvervie: Provides a compact dashboard summarizing at‑risk referrals, intakes, and beds, with counts and navigation to detailed tabs.
frontend/src/components/AdminStatusCheck: Shows admin status, caller principal, and list of admin principals with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/BedsTab.tsx: Manages bed assignment, editing, filtering, and archiving with local preference storage and risk indicators for beds.
frontend/src/components/DashboardOvervie: Fetches referrals, intakes, and beds, computes aggregate stats, and displays them in dashboard cards with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/FacilitiesTab.ts: Provides facility and bed management including creating facilities and adding beds with validation and dialogs.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with branding and external link credit.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the app header with logo, theme toggle, user menu, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/IntakesTab.tsx: Manages intake creation, review, bed assignment, case manager assignment, status history, and exit workflows.
frontend/src/components/PartnerAgencyPro: Loads and edits partner agency profile information with validation and save functionality.
frontend/src/components/PartnerReferrals: Manages partner-agency referral creation, editing, file upload, and lists existing referrals with validation and status display.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for new users to submit basic profile info and trigger profile creation via API.
frontend/src/components/ReferralsTab.tsx: Admin/staff referral management UI for viewing, filtering, updating statuses, requesting info, and reviewing history.
frontend/src/components/ReferralStatusBa: Shows a referral status badge with icon, label, and variant styling based on status value.
frontend/src/components/RequestAccessFor: Form for agencies to submit access requests with required contact details and a confirmation screen.
frontend/src/components/StaffOverviewCom: Dashboard-style summary of referrals, intakes, and beds with at‑risk indicators and navigation links.
frontend/src/components/StatusHistoryTim: Renders a timeline of status history entries with labels, timestamps, and user info, sorting entries newest first.
frontend/src/components/UserManagementTa: Displays all users, separates pending and active users, and allows assigning roles with mutations and badges.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, including login handling, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useNow.ts: Returns a timestamp that auto-updates every minute for time-sensitive UI displays.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for admin checks, user profiles, partner agencies, and more.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base/theme definitions including light/dark color variables and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard with tabbed navigation for managing referrals, intakes, beds, facilities, users, access requests, and activity logs.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page using Internet Identity with an option to request access and a branded info section.
frontend/src/pages/PartnerDashboard.tsx: Partner dashboard with tabs for viewing referrals, submitting new referrals, and managing agency profiles.
frontend/src/pages/StaffDashboard.tsx: Staff dashboard providing tabs for overview, referrals, intakes, and bed management.
frontend/src/utils/atRisk.ts: Utilities for detecting at‑risk referrals, intakes, and beds, plus functions returning human‑readable risk labels.
frontend/src/utils/bedTrackingPreference: LocalStorage-backed load/save utilities for managing bed tracking filter preferences with validation and defaults.
frontend/src/utils/referralValidation.ts: Shared referral form validation functions, error helpers, and simple error message mapping.
frontend/src/utils/referralWaitingTime.t: Helpers for calculating elapsed referral time, formatting waiting time, and checking if referrals are overdue.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL or hash params, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, and container settings with plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Captures the project’s schema version and a detailed summary of features for an IC-based operations platform, including authentication, access control, roles, and workflow management.
